Institution Name: COLLEGE OF ANIMAL HEALTH & PRO. TECH. VOM, (AFFL TO ATBU, BAUCHI), PLATEAU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agricultural Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and one of Geography, Physics and Economics.
Subjects: Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science plus Mathematics or Physics.

Institution Name: COLLEGE OF ANIMAL HEALTH & PRO. TECH. VOM, (AFFL TO ATBU, BAUCHI), PLATEAU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
Subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.
